condition.description:
Psychotic disorders are severe mental disorders that cause abnormal thinking and perceptions. People with psychoses lose touch with reality. Two of the main symptoms are delusions and hallucinations. Delusions are false beliefs, such as thinking that someone is plotting against you or that the TV is sending you secret messages. Hallucinations are false perceptions, such as hearing, seeing, or feeling something that is not there.

Schizophrenia is one type of psychotic disorder. People with bipolar disorder may also have psychotic symptoms. Other problems that can cause psychosis include alcohol and some drugs, brain tumors, brain infections, and stroke.

Treatment depends on the cause of the psychosis. It might involve drugs to control symptoms and talk therapy. Hospitalization is an option for serious cases where a person might be dangerous to himself or others.
condition.name: Psychosis

carousel_items: Compro comes in different forms. Be clear on which one you were prescribed - swallow tablets orally, unwrap and insert suppositories rectally.
You'll likely feel very sleepy, sluggish, or less alert after taking Compro. Avoid driving or other tasks that require your focused attention; be safe.
Don't drink alcohol to avoid intense side effects.
Taking certain medications for pain, allergies, or mood conditions can worsen the side effects of Compro.
Avoid using if you experience seizures (epilepsy).
Don't use if you're 65 or older because you're at higher risk for serious side effects.

basics.benefits_moa: Compro is an antiemetic (anti-nausea medicine). It works by blocking signals in the part of your brain that causes vomiting.
basics.bottom_line: Compro can be used to treat severe nausea and vomiting and can be taken orally or rectally, but get ready for a nap.
downsides: Can make you really drowsy. Drinking alcohol with it can make the drowsiness even worse.
Can't be used by people over 65 because they can be more affected by the side effects.
It can make you more likely to get heatstroke.

downsides_processed.orig: Can make you really drowsy. Drinking alcohol with it can make the drowsiness even worse.
Can't be used by people over 65 because they can be more affected by the side effects.
It can make you more likely to get heatstroke.

upsides: Available in generic, so it's cheap.
Can be taken by mouth, as a shot, or rectally.
Can take anywhere from 10 minutes (by shot) to 60 minutes (rectally) to start working.

upsides_processed.orig: Available in generic, so it's cheap.
Can be taken by mouth, as a shot, or rectally.
Can take anywhere from 10 minutes (by shot) to 60 minutes (rectally) to start working.

drugs.name: Compro

carousel_items_processed.orig: Compro comes in different forms. Be clear on which one you were prescribed - swallow tablets orally, unwrap and insert suppositories rectally.
You'll likely feel very sleepy, sluggish, or less alert after taking Compro. Avoid driving or other tasks that require your focused attention; be safe.
Don't drink alcohol to avoid intense side effects.
Taking certain medications for pain, allergies, or mood conditions can worsen the side effects of Compro.
Avoid using if you experience seizures (epilepsy).
Don't use if you're 65 or older because you're at higher risk for serious side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk of death
risks_warnings.description: It is not recommended for people with dementia over age 65 who are taking antipsychotic medications to take Compro, as there is an increased risk of death. Your doctor will discuss alternatives.

description_processed.orig: It is not recommended for people with dementia over age 65 who are taking antipsychotic medications to take Compro, as there is an increased risk of death. Your doctor will discuss alternatives.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: If you've ever had seizures, taking Compro can make you more likely to have them. Talk to your doctor if this is a concern, or if you're taking medications to control your seizures since they may need to change the dose.

description_processed.orig: If you've ever had seizures, taking Compro can make you more likely to have them. Talk to your doctor if this is a concern, or if you're taking medications to control your seizures since they may need to change the dose.

risks_warnings.title: Involuntary muscle movements
risks_warnings.description: Talk to your doctor right away if you find that you're unable to control your movements (tremors, jerky movements of your arms or legs while walking, trouble swallowing or talking) while you're on Compro.  Your nervous system can be affected by taking this medication, especially if you're taking it for a long time. This is very rare.

description_processed.orig: Talk to your doctor right away if you find that you're unable to control your movements (tremors, jerky movements of your arms or legs while walking, trouble swallowing or talking) while you're on Compro.  Your nervous system can be affected by taking this medication, especially if you're taking it for a long time. This is very rare.

risks_warnings.title: Neuroleptic malignant syndrome
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people taking Compro who have developed a condition called neuroleptic malignant syndrome. This is extremely rare. Call your doctor immediately if you develop a very high fever, your muscles become very stiff, an irregular pulse, or a lot of sweating.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people taking Compro who have developed a condition called neuroleptic malignant syndrome. This is extremely rare. Call your doctor immediately if you develop a very high fever, your muscles become very stiff, an irregular pulse, or a lot of sweating.

risks_warnings.title: Heatstroke
risks_warnings.description: People who are taking Compro can be more likely to get heatstroke. Avoid heavy exercising if you have to use Compro, drink plenty of fluids, and avoid being out in the sun or in a very warm environment.

description_processed.orig: People who are taking Compro can be more likely to get heatstroke. Avoid heavy exercising if you have to use Compro, drink plenty of fluids, and avoid being out in the sun or in a very warm environment.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Compro lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Compro lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

carousel_items: For the first week, avoid activities that require you to be alert.
Report skin rashes or blistering immediately.
Report confusion, persistent abdominal pain, yellowing of eyes/skin, or easy bruising to your doctor.
Takes up to 5 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

basics.benefits_moa: Tegretol is an antiepileptic. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to block certain kinds of nerve activity to reduce seizures and pain.
basics.bottom_line: Tegretol is useful for preventing seizures and relieving certain types of nerve pain, but interacts with many drugs.
downsides: Interacts with many other medicines and supplements.
Higher risk of skin reactions compared to other antiepileptic medicines, ranging from mild to life-threatening rash.
Can cause blurry vision, dizziness, and upset stomach.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.
Requires routine blood tests to see how the medicine is affecting your body.

downsides_processed.orig: Interacts with many other medicines and supplements.
Higher risk of skin reactions compared to other antiepileptic medicines, ranging from mild to life-threatening rash.
Can cause blurry vision, dizziness, and upset stomach.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.
Requires routine blood tests to see how the medicine is affecting your body.

upsides: Lowers the frequency of seizures, especially for people with tonic-clonic and partial seizures.
First-line option for trigeminal neuralgia (nerve pain involving the face, head, and neck), and can relieve other types of nerve pain.
May be helpful in stabilizing mood for people with bipolar disorder.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers the frequency of seizures, especially for people with tonic-clonic and partial seizures.
First-line option for trigeminal neuralgia (nerve pain involving the face, head, and neck), and can relieve other types of nerve pain.
May be helpful in stabilizing mood for people with bipolar disorder.

drugs.one_liner: Prevents seizures, stabilizes mood, and relieves nerve pain.

userStories.tip: How dependent I am on it. The pain is terrifying .

If the medicine is causing a rash, there are many topical steroids that will keep it under control- or vanquish it completely. I get the rash on my face- so when my doc prescribed fluocinolone, it oil changed my life.
make it part of your beauty routine etc so that you won't forget to take it. Always make sure you have enough and if on holiday, be sure to take a prescription along

drugs.name: Tegretol

carousel_items_processed.orig: For the first week, avoid activities that require you to be alert.
Report skin rashes or blistering immediately.
Report confusion, persistent abdominal pain, yellowing of eyes/skin, or easy bruising to your doctor.
Takes up to 5 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

risks_warnings.title: Serious skin rash
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Tegretol can cause a serious or life-threatening skin rash. The risk is higher for people who are also taking Depakote. If you are of Asian descent, you may need a genetic test to find out if you have a gene that causes increased risk. Report any skin rashes to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Tegretol can cause a serious or life-threatening skin rash. The risk is higher for people who are also taking Depakote. If you are of Asian descent, you may need a genetic test to find out if you have a gene that causes increased risk. Report any skin rashes to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Blood disorders
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Tegretol can cause an increased risk for blood disorders. Your blood may be tested on a regular basis to see if it has low white blood cells (for fighting infections) or platelets (for blood clotting).

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Tegretol can cause an increased risk for blood disorders. Your blood may be tested on a regular basis to see if it has low white blood cells (for fighting infections) or platelets (for blood clotting).

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Tegretol may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Tegretol may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Tegretol can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. You may need a genetic test to find out if you have a gene that causes increased risk. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Tegretol can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. You may need a genetic test to find out if you have a gene that causes increased risk. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Pregnancy
risks_warnings.description: Tegretol may cause birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Tegretol may cause birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Mental changes due to low sodium
risks_warnings.description: Tegretol may cause low sodium in the body (hyponatremia), especially in people who are older. Tell your doctor if you notice any confusion, headache, memory problems, difficulty concentrating, weakness, or falls.

description_processed.orig: Tegretol may cause low sodium in the body (hyponatremia), especially in people who are older. Tell your doctor if you notice any confusion, headache, memory problems, difficulty concentrating, weakness, or falls.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal seizures
risks_warnings.description: Stopping Tegretol suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Tegretol, talk to your doctor before making any changes. It’s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

description_processed.orig: Stopping Tegretol suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Tegretol, talk to your doctor before making any changes. It’s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

carousel_items: Take Clozapine exactly as prescribed and don't stop taking it without talking to your doctor.
Can cause dizziness or drowsiness. Avoid alcohol and be careful when changing positions or doing anything that requires your full attention until you know how Clozapine affects you.
Blood tests are needed before you start this medicine and before every refill. You need to pick up the medicine within 7 days of your blood tests.
Can affect your weight, cholesterol, and blood sugar control.

basics.benefits_moa: Clozapine is an atypical antipsychotic. Researchers don't know exactly how it works. It seems to change dopamine and serotonin activity in your brain, which affects thoughts and mood.
basics.bottom_line: Clozapine treats schizophrenia when other drugs haven't worked, but you'll have to get blood work done regularly and can have weight gain.
downsides: You need to get blood work done every time you can get a prescription filled for Clozapine.
You can only get Clozapine at certain pharmacies that are registered to provide it.
If you don't get Clozapine within 7 days of it being ready at the pharmacy, then you have to get blood work done again and get a new prescription from your doctor.
You need to limit the amount of alcohol you drink while on Clozapine.

downsides_processed.orig: You need to get blood work done every time you can get a prescription filled for Clozapine.
You can only get Clozapine at certain pharmacies that are registered to provide it.
If you don't get Clozapine within 7 days of it being ready at the pharmacy, then you have to get blood work done again and get a new prescription from your doctor.
You need to limit the amount of alcohol you drink while on Clozapine.

upsides: Clinical studies show that Clozapine is effective in treating schizophrenia when other medications have failed.
Has the lowest risk of causing movement problems when compared to other antipsychotic medicines.
Clozapine is available as a normal tablet and as a mint-flavored tablet that dissolves on the tongue without water.

upsides_processed.orig: Clinical studies show that Clozapine is effective in treating schizophrenia when other medications have failed.
Has the lowest risk of causing movement problems when compared to other antipsychotic medicines.
Clozapine is available as a normal tablet and as a mint-flavored tablet that dissolves on the tongue without water.

drugs.one_liner: Helps control your thoughts and actions.
drugs.name: Clozaril

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take Clozapine exactly as prescribed and don't stop taking it without talking to your doctor.
Can cause dizziness or drowsiness. Avoid alcohol and be careful when changing positions or doing anything that requires your full attention until you know how Clozapine affects you.
Blood tests are needed before you start this medicine and before every refill. You need to pick up the medicine within 7 days of your blood tests.
Can affect your weight, cholesterol, and blood sugar control.

risks_warnings.title: Fewer white blood cells
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine can lose white blood cells. This makes it harder for the body to fight off infections, and people have died from it. You need to have blood work done every time before your doctor can write a new or refill prescription for Clozapine to make sure you're not at risk.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine can lose white blood cells. This makes it harder for the body to fight off infections, and people have died from it. You need to have blood work done every time before your doctor can write a new or refill prescription for Clozapine to make sure you're not at risk.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure | Slow heartbeat | Fainting
risks_warnings.description: You can be at high risk for low blood pressure and a slower heartbeat while on Clozapine, especially if you're on medications for high blood pressure or if you're dehydrated. This can cause fainting and falling if you're not careful. Drink plenty of liquids throughout the day, and talk to your doctor to see if your medications for your blood pressure need to be changed.

description_processed.orig: You can be at high risk for low blood pressure and a slower heartbeat while on Clozapine, especially if you're on medications for high blood pressure or if you're dehydrated. This can cause fainting and falling if you're not careful. Drink plenty of liquids throughout the day, and talk to your doctor to see if your medications for your blood pressure need to be changed.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine have reported having seizures. The risk gets higher with increasing dose or if you have conditions that make you more likely to have seizures, like alcohol abuse. If you're on medications because you've had seizures in the past, talk to your doctor to see if the medications need to be adjusted.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine have reported having seizures. The risk gets higher with increasing dose or if you have conditions that make you more likely to have seizures, like alcohol abuse. If you're on medications because you've had seizures in the past, talk to your doctor to see if the medications need to be adjusted.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine have had issues with their heart, including swelling of the heart muscles (myocarditis) or other problems with the heart muscles (cardiomyopathy). This can be fatal. Call your doctor immediately if you have chest pain, a fast heartbeat or other problems with your heartbeat, fainting, or flu-like symptoms.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine have had issues with their heart, including swelling of the heart muscles (myocarditis) or other problems with the heart muscles (cardiomyopathy). This can be fatal. Call your doctor immediately if you have chest pain, a fast heartbeat or other problems with your heartbeat, fainting, or flu-like symptoms.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk of death
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people over 65 years old and who have dementia that have died after taking Clozapine to treat psychiatric problems caused by their dementia.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people over 65 years old and who have dementia that have died after taking Clozapine to treat psychiatric problems caused by their dementia.

risks_warnings.title: Weight gain
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine have reported weight gain. This is common. If this bothers you, talk to your doctor about what you can do to stop this from happening.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine have reported weight gain. This is common. If this bothers you, talk to your doctor about what you can do to stop this from happening.

risks_warnings.title: Increased blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine and have diabetes have reported changes in their blood sugar. Talk to your doctor if you need to change your medications for diabetes.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine and have diabetes have reported changes in their blood sugar. Talk to your doctor if you need to change your medications for diabetes.

risks_warnings.title: Increased cholesterol
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine have reported increased cholesterol. Talk to your doctor to reduce your risk of heart problems because of increased cholesterol, or if your medications need to be changed if you already have high cholesterol.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine have reported increased cholesterol. Talk to your doctor to reduce your risk of heart problems because of increased cholesterol, or if your medications need to be changed if you already have high cholesterol.

risks_warnings.title: Neuroleptic malignant syndrome (NMS)
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people on Clozapine who have had neuroleptic malignant syndrome, which can be fatal. This is very rare, but call your doctor immediately if you notice a high fever, rigid muscles, confusion, an irregular heartbeat, and unusual sweating.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people on Clozapine who have had neuroleptic malignant syndrome, which can be fatal. This is very rare, but call your doctor immediately if you notice a high fever, rigid muscles, confusion, an irregular heartbeat, and unusual sweating.

risks_warnings.title: Tardive dyskinesia
risks_warnings.description: People on Clozapine can be more likely to have tardive dyskinesia, which can make you unable to control your movements. This is very rare and can be stopped if you stop taking the medication. If you notice that you can't control your movements, or if you notice shaking or trembling that you can't stop on your own, call your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: People on Clozapine can be more likely to have tardive dyskinesia, which can make you unable to control your movements. This is very rare and can be stopped if you stop taking the medication. If you notice that you can't control your movements, or if you notice shaking or trembling that you can't stop on your own, call your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Return of schizophrenic symptoms
risks_warnings.description: Don't stop taking Clozapine without talking to your doctor, since your symptoms of schizophrenia can come back. You can also have increased sweating, diarrhea, headache, nausea and vomiting. Talk to your doctor if you want to stop taking Clozapine.

description_processed.orig: Don't stop taking Clozapine without talking to your doctor, since your symptoms of schizophrenia can come back. You can also have increased sweating, diarrhea, headache, nausea and vomiting. Talk to your doctor if you want to stop taking Clozapine.
